name: Birdie (Rahulmark)
description:
This is an Endless runner where you are playing as a bird where you have to  protect the bird from obstacles and enemies .There are 2 powerups in the game ,powerups will appear every 10 seconds .One will give you power to shoot 10 bullets and other will full your Health Bar.

Controls:-

W/S or Up/Down Keys-To move the bird up and down.

Left-Mouse Button-To Shoot Enemies and obstacles.(But to shoot you have to collect a diamond Powerup)

Play in Full Screen Mode for the better experience:)
